question: What are the recent trends in technology adoption among companies in the healthcare industry?

subtasks.task: Identify companies in the healthcare industry and gather their basic information such as name, revenue, and founding year.
Analyze technology focus areas of the identified healthcare companies to understand their strategic technology initiatives.
Collect data on vendor technology details and product adoption by these healthcare companies to evaluate the technologies currently in use.
Review the latest contracts from the Company Deal Master to see what kinds of technological services are being procured by healthcare companies.
Compile and summarize insights regarding the trends observed in technology adoption in the healthcare sector from the compiled data.
